Airbomber: Bye, bye, Infectra.

Airbomber disconnected.

Arrow: Now what do=
 you plan to do? You and your brother are welcome with the Maximals.

Airbo=
mber: Time Warp, do you want to stay here?

Stranato: Yeah, come on, we're =
nice guys.

Train Wreck: And I need to talk to you in private, Airbomber.

=
Arrow: Infectra was scum, you are one of us.

Airbomber: Take that back!

A=
rrow: No.

Airbomber; I'll kill you!

Train Wreck steps in front of Airbomb=
er. He moves his mouth to the words "not now."
  ----- Original Message ---=
-- 
  From: *Orchid* 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, March 1=
8, 2001 5:36 PM
  Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


  (OOC: Hey Yanshosh,=
 do the shuttles fly automatically? If not, how are they supposed to fly th=
em?)

   
  Armada/Blizzard/Kamodia



  (Blizzard walks into the shuttle w=
ith Kamodia and Armada.)


  Armada: The Maximals? I hate them. I got to si=
t around and do nothing there. Right now I'm sitting in a shuttle with 2 ot=
her bots. I'm being sent out to collect DNA samples. At the Maximal base, t=
hey make you guard stuff thats already escaped or destroyed and they leave =
you to die. I had to do something. I couldn't live like that. It sucked.


=
  (Armada says back to Airbomber.)

rom: Soulstice Omega

    Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


    Airbomber l=
ooked to Arrow. Arrow was smiling.

    AIrbomber: Alliance base? But what =
about the Maximals!?...

com

Re: Big Post(with fries)


            Airbomber: I'm here with Time Warp, =
come on baby, you know it's me! I'm black and white, I change into a cheeta=
h, well I used to, but I like my robot mode, and I got inhaled by that guy,=
 remember?...

m: *Orchid*

Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:50 AM

es)

 sure that's you?

 18, 2001 3:32 AM

     =
           Arrow puts Airbomber on.

                Airbomber: Infectra? I=
s that you really?...
                  ----- Original Message ----- 
     =
             From: *Orchid* 
                  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
=
                  Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:24 AM
                  Su=
bject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                  Armada



             =
     Armada: Airbomber? You mean he's not dead!? Uh...Put him on...I guess.=
..


                  (Armada says back in the commlink to Arrow confused.=
)

                    ----- Original Message ----- 
                    Fr=
om: Soulstice Omega 
                    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
              Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:17 AM
                    Subj=
ect: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                    Arrow: Hera that, Airbo=
mber? She USED to be Infectra!

                    Airbomber: You can't fo=
ol me, you just got someone who sounds just like her to pose as her...LET M=
E TALK TO HER!

                    Arrow: Airbomber wants to talk to you, =
Infectra. I mean, Armada...
                      ----- Original Message --=
--- 
                      From: *Orchid* 
                      To: nbwrpg=
@yahoogroups.com 
                      Sent: Sunday, March 18, 2001 3:10 A=
M
                      Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


               =
       Armada



                      (Armada listens to the voice coming =
over her commlink.)


                      Armada: Actually, no. But that =
was my original name. I'm Armada now. Who is this?


                      =
(Armada says into the commlink and awaits an answer from Arrow.)

         =
               ----- Original Message ----- 
                        From: =
Soulstice Omega 
                        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
      =
                  Sent: Saturday, March 17, 2001 10:19 PM
                 =
       Subject: Re: Big Post(with fries)


                        Airbombe=
r: But where do we go?

                        Arrow: That's up to you, Ai=
rbomber, but I wouldn't lie to you.

                        Train Wreck: A=
ctually, he WOULD lie to you, but I wouldn't, and I seen this as well.

   =
                     Stranato: I didn't see it, but I believe it.

        =
                Airbomber: But how can that be?

                        Ar=
row: Call her.

                        Airbomber: I tried that.

         =
               Arrow: You don't keep track of those kind of things? I'll ca=
ll her.

                        Arrow calls Armada by commlink.

         =
               Arrow: Is there anyone named Infectra there?...

               ----- Original Message ----- 
                          From=

                          OO=
C: Please add the new Destron base to the events page, Zardus.  Its in 
   =
                       Syria. 

                          :::Ramjet/Wheelja=
ck/Vulois/Time Warp::: 

                          Ramjet: The one extremel=
y close to us belongs to the Trainers.  They are led 
                     =
     by a bot named Prebon.  They are powerful, and are enemies of the Maxi=
mals 
                          and Alliance.  The other one is the Blackfo=
rtress, the base a large faction 
                          of Predacons.  =
There are three Predacon leaders there, and i think we might 
             =
             be able to work out an Alliance with them. 
                  =
        ~~~~~ 
                          Wheeljack: I'd say a sloping, hill=
-type shape.(Thanks for the idea Zardus!) 
                          ~~~~~ =

                          Vulois: Yes, lets. I think we should first go to=
 the Maximals, for they will 
                          be the most likely =
to cooperate.  Even so, there are a lot of warlike 
                       =
   Maximals, so be ready for anything. 
                          ::he walk=
s out of his cave and starts flying to the CF:: 
                          =
~~~~~ 
                          ::Time Warp was releived that they were fr=
iends, until he heard what they 
                          said about Infec=
tra:: 
                          Time Warp: Infectra?! In the Alliance?! I =
didnt know her very well, but she 
                          definately was=
nt Alliance material!  Lets get out of here Airbomber, these 
             =
             guys are fools.
